title: Mini-Ep 45: Self-Acceptance and A La Mer Mystery
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 45: Self-Acceptance and A La Mer Mystery
itunes:subtitle: Kate and Doree give advice to a caller who’s 40 and still trying to figure out how to feel comfortable in her own skin, and help a listener navigate self-care while facing obstacles with her husband. Plus, they give some tips to a very honest caller wh...
description:
Kate and Doree give advice to a caller who’s 40 and still trying to figure out how to feel comfortable in her own skin, and help a listener navigate self-care while facing obstacles with her husband. Plus, they give some tips to a very honest caller who was sent $500 worth of La Mer products and doesn’t know whether to keep them.

To leave a voicemail for a future episode, call 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com. To learn more, visit forver35podcast.com.

This episode is sponsored by:

  • Buffy - For $20 off your Buffy comforter visit buffy.co and enter promo code forever35.
  • Fabletics - Get two leggings for $24 a ($99 value!) when you sign up for a VIP membership at fabletics.com/forever35.
  • Poshmark - Visit poshmark.com and enter invite code DOREESHA to get $5 off your first purchase. (Also Doree’s closet name!)


Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
